page.title: 07St Minver's Retired Postman
page.content: One of the best known{local characters has just retired as a postman based at St Minver. His father used to be a postman in the parish before him. He was{born and bred}in the village and has lived in the parish all his life. His was a country round and he used to {cycle}several miles a day, but now a postal van has taken over him.{Music has been his favourite lifelong interest. He enjoys listening as well as playing in a band and singing in a choir. In his spare time he enjoys playing the accordion and the harmonium. He loves all music and choirs. He used to be in{Treviscoe {Male Voice Choir}but now he has recently joined Wadebridge Male Voice Choir. Now he has a part time job at Trebetherick as a cleaner at the local telephone exchange.
